issue.title: Add Negative Cases to Tests
issue.body:
We should test:

- Invalid project names
- GitHub Errors

issue.title: When GitHub API Calls Fail, show an error message
issue.body: We've got some promise goofiness, for example when opening an issue... We need to cover the promise rejection cases.

issue.title: Final Submission
issue.body:
- [x] Make sure that the 'What Can You Do' intent lists all of the intents
- [x] Check all content for spelling / typos / punctuation @dwmkerr
- [x] Check all content for spelling / typos / punctuation @mindmelting

issue.title: Update the 'abortStatement' and 'clarifyPrompts'
issue.body: When clarifying, it might be good to say 'you can ask me 'what can you do?''

issue.title: Intent: Goodbye
issue.body:
See the last paragraph of:

http://docs.aws.amazon.com/lex/latest/dg/gl-guidelines.html

> We encourage you to define an intent that captures a user's intention to discontinue the conversation. For example, you can define an intent (NothingIntent) with sample utterances ("I don't want anything", "exit", "bye bye"), no slots, and no Lambda function configured as a code hook. This would let users gracefully close a conversation.
